summary.estimated_space_savings: High - removing test artifacts, build reports, and duplicate configs

1_markdown_documentation_obsolete.reason: Per user's .cursorrules, technical docs should be JSON. These are outdated troubleshooting docs for resolved issues.
1_markdown_documentation_obsolete.notes: All issues documented in these files have been resolved. Information is captured in JSON docs in Docs/json/

2_unused_components.reason: No imports found in codebase. Components are not referenced anywhere.

details.PostHogExample.tsx: Example/demo component for PostHog tracking - never imported
details.DisclaimerTooltip.tsx: Duplicate of src/ppm-tool/components/common/DisclaimerTooltip.tsx which is also unused
details.EmbeddableChartDemo.tsx: Demo component with sample data - 386 lines - never used
details.OptimizedToolCard.tsx: Old card component - not imported anywhere
details.ToolCard.tsx: Base card component - replaced by enhanced version
details.desktop-tooltip.tsx: Old tooltip with debug console.logs - superseded by enhanced-desktop-tooltip.tsx
details.simple-hover-tooltip.tsx: Testing component - not used in production
details.mobile-touch-tooltip.tsx: Old mobile tooltip - replaced by MobileTooltip.tsx

3_unused_filter_folder.reason: Folder explicitly named 'unused' - contains old filter implementations
3_unused_filter_folder.notes: Entire 'unused' folder can be deleted - replaced by FilterSystem.tsx

4_debug_components.reason: Debug components that may be useful for troubleshooting
4_debug_components.recommendation: Review usage in AdminDashboard and EmbeddedPPMToolFlow. If only used for debugging, consider keeping but gating behind environment variable.

details.EnvironmentDebug.tsx: Used in AdminDashboard - verify if still needed
details.MobileDiagnostics.tsx: Used in EmbeddedPPMToolFlow - verify if still needed
details.MobileRecoverySystem.tsx: Used in EmbeddedPPMToolFlow - verify if still needed
details.TouchDetectionDebug.tsx: Imported by EmbeddableComparisonChart but only in commented code

5_demo_components.reason: Demo components with hardcoded sample data
5_demo_components.notes: Demo component for exit intent - not imported anywhere

6_duplicate_disclaimer.reason: Neither DisclaimerTooltip file is imported anywhere
6_duplicate_disclaimer.notes: Two identical DisclaimerTooltip files (only z-index differs). Neither is imported. Delete both.

7_test_artifacts.reason: Generated test results and reports - can be regenerated
7_test_artifacts.notes: These are generated by Playwright tests. Can be deleted and regenerated. Should be in .gitignore.

details.tailwind.config.ts: TypeScript config exists but components.json and postcss.config.js reference tailwind.config.js. The .ts file appears to be a duplicate with different content. Keep tailwind.config.js, delete tailwind.config.ts.
details.index.html: Vite-style HTML file (references /src/main.tsx) - project uses Next.js which generates its own HTML. This is a leftover from a previous build system. SAFE TO DELETE.

9_javascript_utility.reason: Test utility file not imported in production
9_javascript_utility.notes: Development test utility. Imported once in ClientProviders.tsx. Check if still needed for error suppression testing.

10_public_utility.reason: Utility script that may be referenced in production
10_public_utility.notes: Cache cleanup script. Check if referenced in any HTML/layout files before deleting.

phase_1_safe_deletions.description: Delete files with no imports and no references

phase_2_verify_then_delete.description: Check usage in browser/production before deleting
verification_steps: Check if testErrorSuppression is still needed for development
Search for clear-cache.js references in HTML/layouts
Verify debug components not used in production admin panel

phase_3_test_artifacts.notes: Add to .gitignore if not already present

immediate: Delete all Phase 1 files (23 files + 1 directory) - completely safe
Delete test artifacts directories - regenerated on each test run
Remove obsolete markdown documentation - info preserved in JSON
investigate: Review debug components in admin dashboard - may want to keep gated behind env var
Verify testErrorSuppression not actively used in development workflow
future_cleanup: Review if animation README is still accurate
Audit JSON documentation in Docs/json/ for outdated entries

gitignore_recommendations.reason: Generated files that don't need version control
